## DIDCommConfig interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

The config for the [DIDComm](./did-comm.didcomm.md) DIDComm plugin.

This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface DIDCommConfig<T extends IDIDCommTransport = DIDCommHttpTransport>
```

## Properties

| Property                                              | Modifiers | Type  | Description               |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----- | ------------------------- |
| [transports?](./did-comm.didcommconfig.transports.md) |           | T\[\] | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ |
